mapper.select: select category,count(1) as num from user_content where u_id = #{uid} and personal = '0' group by category order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into user_content(id, u_id, title, category, content, personal,rpt_time ,img_url,nick_name,upvote,downvote,comment_num) values(#{id}, #{uId},#{title}, #{category},#{content},#{personal},#{rptTime}, #{imgUrl},#{nickName},#{upvote},#{downvote},#{commentNum})
